greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Least positive number k such that 2^k mod k = 2n+1, or 0 if no such k exists.
formula: A bisection of A036236: a(n) = A036236(2n+1).
mathematica: While[PowerMod[2, k, k] != 2 n + 1, k++]; k]
results.author: _Zak Seidov_, Nov 14 2006
